intro.p: Implements the core functionality and exposes the common methods for concrete controllers.

section.title: Controller()
section.p: Constructs a Controller

tr.td: This is intended to be used by MonoRail infrastructure.
Gets the actions available in this controller.
Gets a dictionary of name/helper instance
Gets or set the layout being used.
Gets the name of the action being processed.
Gets or sets the view which will be rendered by this action.
Gets the property bag, which is used to pass variables to the view.
Gets the context of this request execution.
Gets a dictionary of volative items. Ideal for showing success and failures messages.
Gets the web context of ASP.NET API.

Determines if the current Action resulted from an ASP.NET PostBack. As a result, this property is only relavent when using WebForms views. It is placed on the base Controller for convenience only to avoid the need to extend the Controller or provide additional helper classes.

section.title: PostSendView(Object view)
section.p: Invoked by the view engine to perform any logic after the view had been sent to the client.

section.title: PreSendView(Object view)
section.p: Invoked by the view engine to perform any logic before the view is sent to the client.

section.title: Initialize()
section.p: Missing summary

section.title: GetRescueFor(IList rescues, Type exceptionType) : RescueDescriptor
section.p: Missing summary

section.title: PerformRescue(MethodInfo method, Exception ex) : Boolean
section.p: Missing summary

section.title: ObtainDefaultLayoutName() : String
section.p: Missing summary

section.title: ReleaseResources()
section.p: Missing summary

section.title: CreateResources(MethodInfo method)
section.p: Missing summary

section.title: InvokeMethod(MethodInfo method, IRequest request, Object[] methodArgs)
section.p: Pendent

section.title: SelectMethod(String action, IDictionary actions, IRequest request, Object[] actionArgs) : MethodInfo
section.p: Pendent

section.title: CreateAndInitializeHelpers()
section.p: Missing summary

section.title: InternalSend(String action, Object[] actionArgs)
section.p:
Performs the specified action, which means:
1. Define the default view name
2. Run the before filters
3. Select the method related to the action name and invoke it
4. On error, execute the rescues if available
5. Run the after filters
6. Invoke the view engine

section.title: Redirect(String url, IDictionary parameters)
section.p: Redirects to the specified URL.

section.title: Redirect(String url)
section.p: Redirects to the specified URL. All other Redirects call this one.

section.title: RenderView(String name)
section.p: Specifies the view to be processed after the action has finished its processing.

section.title: RenderView(String name, Boolean skipLayout)
section.p: Specifies the view to be processed after the action has finished its processing.

section.title: RenderView(String controller, String name)
section.p: Specifies the view to be processed after the action has finished its processing.

section.title: RenderView(String controller, String name, Boolean skipLayout)
section.p: Specifies the view to be processed after the action has finished its processing.

section.title: InPlaceRenderView(TextWriter output, String name)
section.p: Specifies the view to be processed and results are written to System.IO.TextWriter.

tr.td: The name of the view to process.

section.title: RenderSharedView(String name)
section.p: Specifies the shared view to be processed after the action has finished its processing. (A partial view shared by others views and usually in the root folder of the view directory).

section.title: RenderSharedView(String name, Boolean skipLayout)
section.p: Specifies the shared view to be processed after the action has finished its processing. (A partial view shared by others views and usually in the root folder of the view directory).

section.title: InPlaceRenderSharedView(TextWriter output, String name)
section.p: Specifies the shared view to be processed and results are written to System.IO.TextWriter. (A partial view shared by others views and usually in the root folder of the view directory).

tr.td: The name of the view to process.

section.title: CancelView()
section.p: Cancels the view processing.

section.title: CancelLayout()
section.p: Cancels the layout processing.

section.title: RenderText(String contents)
section.p: Cancels the view processing and writes the specified contents to the browser

section.title: RenderText(String contents, Object[] args)
section.p: Cancels the view processing and writes the specified contents to the browser

section.title: RenderText(IFormatProvider formatProvider, String contents, Object[] args)
section.p: Cancels the view processing and writes the specified contents to the browser

section.title: DirectRender(String contents)
section.p: Sends raw contents to be rendered directly by the view engine. It's up to the view engine just to apply the layout and nothing else.

section.title: HasTemplate(String templateName) : Boolean
section.p: Returns true if the specified template exists.

section.title: RedirectToAction(String action)
section.p: Redirects to another action in the same controller.

section.title: RedirectToAction(String action, String[] queryStringParameters)
section.p: Redirects to another action in the same controller.

tr.td: list of key/value pairs. Each string is supposed to have the format "key=value" that will be converted to a proper query string

section.title: RedirectToAction(String action, IDictionary queryStringParameters)
section.p: Redirects to another action in the same controller.

section.title: RedirectToAction(String action, NameValueCollection queryStringParameters)
section.p: Redirects to another action in the same controller.

section.title: CreateAbsoluteRailsUrl(String area, String controller, String action) : String
section.p: Missing summary

section.title: CreateAbsoluteRailsUrl(String controller, String action) : String
section.p: Missing summary

section.title: CreateAbsoluteRailsUrlForAction(String action) : String
section.p: Missing summary

section.title: Redirect(String controller, String action)
section.p: Redirects to another controller and action.

section.title: Redirect(String area, String controller, String action)
section.p: Redirects to another controller and action.

section.title: Redirect(String controller, String action, NameValueCollection parameters)
section.p: Redirects to another controller and action with the specified paramters.

section.title: Redirect(String area, String controller, String action, NameValueCollection parameters)
section.p: Redirects to another controller and action with the specified paramters.

section.title: Redirect(String controller, String action, IDictionary parameters)
section.p: Redirects to another controller and action with the specified paramters.

section.title: Redirect(String area, String controller, String action, IDictionary parameters)
section.p: Redirects to another controller and action with the specified paramters.

section.title: ToQueryString(NameValueCollection parameters) : String
section.p: Missing summary

section.title: ToQueryString(IDictionary parameters) : String
section.p: Missing summary

section.title: Send(String action)
section.p:
Performs the specified action, which means:
1. Define the default view name
2. Run the before filters
3. Select the method related to the action name and invoke it
4. On error, execute the rescues if available
5. Run the after filters
6. Invoke the view engine

section.title: Send(String action, Object[] actionArgs)
section.p: Performs the specified action with arguments.

section.title: ShouldSkip(MethodInfo method, IDictionary filtersToSkip) : Boolean
section.p: Missing summary

section.title: CopyFilterDescriptors() : FilterDescriptor[]
section.p: Clones all Filter descriptors, in order to get a writable copy.

section.title: RenderMailMessage(String templateName) : Message
section.p: Creates an instance of Castle.Components.Common.EmailSender.Message using the specified template for the body

tr.td: Name of the template to load. Will look in Views/mail for that template file.

section.title: DeliverEmail(Message message)
section.p: Attempts to deliver the Message using the server specified on the web.config.

tr.td: The instance of System.Web.Mail.MailMessage that will be sent

section.title: RenderEmailAndSend(String templateName)
section.p: Renders and delivers the e-mail message.

section.title: RaiseOnActionExceptionOnExtension()
section.p: Missing summary
